about.title: How Fablecast Works
about.subtitle: A magical pipeline turns character bibles into fully illustrated, narrated children's books across three languages. Here's how the magic happens.

0.title: Character Bibles
0.description: Each of our six series starts with a lovingly written character bible — defining the lead character, supporting cast, art style, tone, and world rules. These bibles ensure every story feels consistent, safe, and true to the character’s personality.

1.title: Story Generation
1.description: Our AI story engine writes brand-new adventures for each series. Stories follow age-appropriate narrative structures — friendship arcs, gentle mysteries, discovery journeys — with emotional beats calibrated for children aged 3–8.

2.title: Illustration
2.description: Each page gets a unique, full-color illustration generated to match the character’s established art style. Visual consistency is maintained by injecting character anchors and style descriptors into every image prompt.

3.title: Translation
3.description: The English master edition is translated into Turkish and Japanese (with more languages coming soon). Translated editions reuse the original illustrations, so visual storytelling stays consistent across all languages.

4.title: Narration
4.description: AI-powered text-to-speech generates warm, expressive narration for every page. Each language has its own carefully selected voice. Audio syncs with progressive text reveal for an immersive read-along experience.

5.title: Weekly Updates
5.description: New stories are added to the library every week across all 6 series and 3 languages. The library keeps growing, so there’s always a fresh adventure waiting.

about.safetyDescription: Every series has built-in world rules that prevent inappropriate settings or themes. Stories are guardrailed to stay cozy, positive, and age-appropriate. We review output quality regularly and adjust our safety parameters continuously.
about.adFreeDescription: Fablecast will never show advertisements. Your family’s reading time is sacred and will always be free from commercial interruptions.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Fablecast.

0.a: Fablecast is a children’s story library. We create fully illustrated and narrated stories across 6 character series and 3 languages, with new stories added every week. It’s like a storybook shelf that keeps growing — digital and always available.

1.a: Fablecast is designed for parents and guardians of children aged 3–8. The stories are created with age-appropriate language, gentle themes, and engaging illustrations perfect for bedtime reading or independent exploration.

2.a: Click "Get Started" on the landing page and sign in with your Google account. You’ll choose your preferred language and you’re ready to go. No separate password to remember.

3.q: Can I try it for free?
3.a: Yes! Free readers get access to 6 sample books — one from each character series — with the full reading experience including illustrations and audio. It’s a great way to see if Fablecast is right for your family.

0.a: Each story is generated by AI using carefully crafted character bibles that define the characters, art styles, world rules, and tone. The AI writes the text, generates unique illustrations, and creates audio narration. Safety guardrails ensure all content is age-appropriate.

1.q: How often are new stories added?
1.a: New stories are added to the library every week across all six series and three languages. As a member, you get immediate access to every new story as it arrives.

2.a: Yes! All stories in the library remain available. You can revisit any story anytime.

3.a: Currently: English, Turkish, and Japanese. We’re actively working on adding Spanish, Portuguese, German, and French — stay tuned to our blog for updates.

4.q: Are the stories safe for kids?
4.a: Absolutely. Every character series has built-in world rules that prevent inappropriate themes or settings. Stories are designed to be warm, positive, and encouraging. We continuously review and improve our safety parameters.

0.q: How much does a membership cost?
0.a: Membership is $4.99 per month. It gives you full access to every story in the library across all 6 series, all 3 languages, including audio narration and all future stories.

1.a: Yes. You can cancel your membership at any time through your account settings. You’ll keep full access until the end of your current billing period, then your account reverts to free access.

2.a: Membership payments are non-refundable with no prorated refunds for partial months. We encourage trying the free sample books first to make sure Fablecast is a good fit.

3.q: Can I change my preferred language?
3.a: Yes! You can change your preferred language anytime in your account settings.

0.a: Fablecast stories are web-based and work on any modern browser — phones, tablets, laptops, and desktops. No app download required. Stories are designed mobile-first for the best tablet/phone reading experience.

1.a: Stories are packaged as PWA-ready web books. Once loaded, they can be saved to your home screen and accessed offline on supported devices.

2.a: Yes! All stories include AI-generated narration with progressive text reveal. Audio is included for all members.

0.a: Only the minimum necessary: your email (from Google Sign-In), display name, and your language preference. We don’t collect any data from children directly, and we don’t track browsing behavior.

1.a: No. Fablecast is ad-free and will remain ad-free for the lifetime of the product. Your family’s reading time will never be interrupted by advertisements.

2.a: Never. We don’t sell, rent, or trade personal data. See our Privacy Policy for full details.

Reading time is family time — we won’t interrupt it

s1.heading: 1. Who We Are
s1.body: Fablecast ("we", "us", "our") operates fablecast.kids, a children’s story library service. This policy explains how we handle your information when you use our service. We are committed to protecting the privacy of our users and their families.

s2.heading: 2. What Data We Collect
s2.intro: We collect the minimum data necessary to operate the service:
items: Email address — provided through Google Sign-In, used solely for account identification and essential service communications.
Display name — provided through Google Sign-In, used to personalize your experience.
Account preferences — preferred language. You provide this during onboarding.
Membership status — whether you are a free reader or a member.
s2.noOtherData: We do not collect, store, or process any other personal data. We do not collect browsing behavior, device fingerprints, or location data. We use only functional session cookies required for authentication — we do not use tracking cookies, advertising cookies, or analytics cookies. We do not collect any information from or about children directly.

s3.heading: 3. How We Use Your Data
s3.intro: Your data is used exclusively to:
items: Authenticate your account via Google Sign-In.
Deliver stories in your preferred language.
Manage your membership.
Send essential service communications (e.g., membership confirmations or critical service updates).
s3.neverUsedFor: We will never use your data for advertising, profiling, or any purpose beyond operating the Fablecast service.

s4.heading: 4. Advertising
s4.body: Fablecast is and will remain ad-free for the lifetime of the product. We do not display advertisements, sell ad space, or share any data with advertising networks or third-party trackers.

s5.heading: 5. Data Sharing
s5.intro: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal data. We share data only with:
items: Google (Firebase) — for authentication and secure data storage. Google’s privacy policy applies to their processing of sign-in data.

Stripe — for payment processing. Stripe receives only the payment information necessary to process your membership subscription. Fablecast never stores your credit card number or full payment details. Stripe’s privacy policy applies to their handling of payment data.
s5.noOtherThirdParties: We do not use any other third-party services that receive your personal data beyond the two listed above.

s6.heading: 6. Data Storage & Security
s6.body: Your data is stored in Google Firebase (Firestore) with encryption at rest and in transit. We retain your data only for as long as your account is active. Upon account deletion, all your data is permanently removed within 30 days.

s7.heading: 7. Children’s Privacy (COPPA & GDPR-K)
s7.body1: Fablecast is a service for parents and guardians to provide stories to their children. We do not knowingly collect personal information directly from children under 13 (or under 16 in the EU/EEA). All accounts must be created by a parent or legal guardian using their own Google account.
s7.body2: If we learn that we have inadvertently collected data from a child without parental consent, we will delete it promptly. If you believe a child has provided us with personal data, please contact us at the address below.

s8.heading: 8. Your Rights
s8.intro: Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have the right to:

allUsers.heading: All Users
items: Access the personal data we hold about you.
Request correction of inaccurate data.
Request deletion of your account and all associated data.

euEea.heading: EU/EEA Residents (GDPR)
items: Right to data portability.
Right to restrict or object to processing.
Right to withdraw consent at any time.
Right to lodge a complaint with your local Data Protection Authority.
euEea.legalBasis: Legal basis for processing: Contractual necessity (providing the service you subscribed to) and legitimate interest (maintaining account security).

japan.heading: Japan Residents (APPI)
items: Right to request disclosure of personal data held.
Right to request correction, addition, or deletion.
Right to request cessation of use.

us.heading: US Residents (CCPA / State Laws)
items: Right to know what personal information is collected.
Right to request deletion.
Right to non-discrimination for exercising your rights.
We do not sell personal information.

s9.heading: 9. International Data Transfers
s9.body: Your data may be processed in the United States through Google Firebase. Where data is transferred outside your jurisdiction, it is protected by Google’s data processing agreements and Standard Contractual Clauses (for EU/EEA transfers).

s10.heading: 10. Changes to This Policy
s10.body: We may update this policy from time to time. Material changes will be communicated via email to the address associated with your account. Continued use of the service after notification constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

s11.heading: 11. Contact Us
s11.body: For any privacy-related questions, data requests, or concerns, please contact us at:

s1.heading: 1. Acceptance of Terms
s1.body: By accessing or using Fablecast ("the Service"), operated at fablecast.kids, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, you may not use the Service. The Service is intended for use by parents and legal guardians on behalf of their children.

s2.heading: 2. Description of Service
s2.body: Fablecast is a children’s story library service. We generate illustrated, narrated stories across multiple languages and character series, with new stories added weekly. Stories are generated using artificial intelligence and are intended for children aged 3–8, to be enjoyed with parental guidance.

s3.heading: 3. Accounts
items: You must be at least 18 years old (or the age of majority in your jurisdiction) to create an account.
Accounts are created via Google Sign-In. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your Google account.
One account per household. Accounts are non-transferable.
You are responsible for all activity under your account.
Free — Access to 6 sample books (one per series). No payment required.
Member ($4.99/month) — Full access to the entire library, all series, all languages, and AI-generated audio narration.
Memberships are billed monthly on the anniversary of your sign-up date.
Prices are in USD and may be subject to applicable taxes.
We reserve the right to change pricing with 30 days’ advance notice.

refunds.body: All membership payments are non-refundable. There are no prorated refunds for partial months. We encourage you to try the free sample books before subscribing to ensure the Service meets your needs.

s5.heading: 5. Cancellation
items: You may cancel your membership at any time through your account settings.
Upon cancellation, you will retain full access to the Service and all stories until the end of your current billing period.
After the billing period ends, your account will revert to free access with sample books only.

s6.heading: 6. Preference Changes
items: Language preference may be changed anytime in your account settings.
Changes take effect immediately.

items: All stories, illustrations, narrations, characters, and related content are published and controlled by Fablecast. The legal landscape around AI-generated content ownership continues to evolve; regardless, Fablecast retains all rights to the content as published on the Service.
Content is generated using artificial intelligence. Automated safety guardrails are in place, though content is not individually reviewed page by page.
You are granted a personal, non-commercial, non-transferable license to access and enjoy stories through the Service.
You may not redistribute, republish, sell, or commercially exploit any content from the Service.
You may not use automated tools to scrape, download, or bulk-extract content.

s8.heading: 8. Acceptable Use
items: Share your account credentials with others.
Use the Service for any unlawful purpose.
Attempt to interfere with or disrupt the Service.
Reverse-engineer, decompile, or attempt to extract the source code of the Service.
Use the Service to compete with or replicate Fablecast.

s9.heading: 9. AI-Generated Content Disclaimer
s9.body: All stories, illustrations, and narrations on Fablecast are generated using artificial intelligence. Content is not manually reviewed on a page-by-page basis. While we implement automated safety guardrails to ensure age-appropriateness, AI-generated content may occasionally contain unexpected or imperfect elements. We strongly encourage parents and guardians to read stories alongside their children. If you encounter any content that seems inappropriate, please report it to us immediately at legal@fablecast.kids.

s10.heading: 10. Service Availability
items: We aim to add new stories weekly but do not guarantee uninterrupted service.
Maintenance, API issues, or unforeseen circumstances may occasionally affect story generation.
We will make reasonable efforts to notify users of planned downtime.

For users in the EU/EEA, nothing in these Terms affects your rights under mandatory consumer protection laws of your country of residence. s13.body: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if you violate these Terms. Upon termination for cause, you forfeit access to the Service immediately with no refund for the remaining billing period.

s2.heading: Service Description
s2.body: Fablecast is a children’s story library service. We provide AI-generated illustrated and narrated stories for children aged 3–8, available in English, Turkish, and Japanese. Stories are published across six character series, with new stories added weekly. The service is accessed through the website at fablecast.kids.

s3.heading: Pricing
items: Free — $0. Access to 6 sample books (one per series), with full reading experience including audio narration. No payment required.
Member — $4.99 per month (USD). Full access to the entire library: all series, all languages, new weekly stories, and AI-generated audio narration.

s4.heading: Payment Method
s4.body: Credit card payments processed securely through Stripe. Fablecast does not store credit card numbers or full payment details.

s5.heading: Payment Timing
s5.body: Membership is billed monthly on the anniversary of the sign-up date. Payment is charged at the beginning of each billing cycle.

s6.heading: Delivery
s6.body: The service is delivered digitally via the website at fablecast.kids. Stories are available immediately upon account creation (free) or payment confirmation (member). No physical products are shipped.

s7.heading: Cancellation & Refunds
items: You may cancel your membership at any time through your account settings.
Upon cancellation, you retain full access until the end of the current billing period. After that, your account reverts to free access with sample books only.
All membership payments are non-refundable. There are no prorated refunds for partial months. We encourage you to try the free sample books before subscribing.

s8.heading: Operating Environment
s8.body: Fablecast works on modern web browsers (Chrome, Safari, Firefox, Edge) on desktop and mobile devices. A stable internet connection is required for reading and audio playback.
